name: The 4th Int'l Conference on Radiation Effects and Radiation Protection
content: The 4th Int'l Conference on Radiation Effects and Radiation Protection (RERP 2018) will be held from December 1-3, 2018 in Sanya, China. This Conference will cover issues on Radiation Effects and Radiation Protection. RERP 2018 dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
